column2: University of the West of England, Bristol
column3: Department of Architecture and the Built Environment
column5: In today's ever-changing market, construction professionals need the knowledge and skills available through postgraduate study more than ever. Successful project managers need to be able to think, lead and act in an uncertain and dynamic business environment, have access to the latest information, understand the appropriate techniques and systems, and have the expertise to apply these to market needs and business opportunities.
column7: Full time Home Award Fee £9000 Home Module Fee (15 Credit) £750  Part time Home Module Fee (15 Credit) £750 Offshore Module Fee (15 Credit) £1188
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
